item.title: Reflection I
item.description: RGermain, Randall. “Reflection I.” In Information, Technology and Control in a Changing World: Understanding Power Structures in the 21st Century. Blayne Haggart, Kathryn Henne, Natasha Tusikov, editors. 81-89. Cham: Palgrave Macmillan, 2019. Randall Germain reflects on the chapters by Blayne Haggart, and Sara Bannerman and Angela Orasch. Keywords: Knowledge Text access (external link)
